What are the best practices for submitting a batch of jobs.  I have a
list of fqdn's in a database and I want heritrix to consider each one
a seperate job.  The plan so far is to write a script to populate the
jobs directory with the right info.

Is this the right way to do it?

Thanks,
Sunny
